sources.node_modules/vuetify/src/components/VSna:
@import './_variables.scss'

.v-snack
  align-items: center
  color: $snackbar-color
  display: flex
  font-size: 14px
  left: 8px
  pointer-events: none
  position: fixed
  right: 8px
  text-align: left
  transition-duration: .15s
  transition-timing-function: map-get($transition, 'linear-out-slow-in')
  z-index: 1000

  &--absolute
    position: absolute

  &--top
    top: 8px

  &--bottom
    bottom: 8px

  &__wrapper
    align-items: center
    background-color: $snackbar-background-color
    border-radius: $snackbar-border-radius
    display: flex
    margin: 0 auto
    pointer-events: auto
    transition: inherit
    transition-property: opacity, transform
    min-width: 100%
    +elevation(6)

  &__content
    align-items: center
    display: flex
    min-height: 48px
    justify-content: space-between
    overflow: hidden
    padding: 8px 16px
    width: 100%

    .v-btn.v-btn
      color: $snackbar-color
      flex: 0 0 auto
      height: auto
      min-width: auto
      padding: 8px
      width: auto

      +ltr()
        margin: 0 -8px 0 24px

      +rtl()
        margin: 0 24px 0 -8px

      &__content
        margin: -2px

      &::before
        display: none

  &--multi-line &__content
    height: auto
    min-height: 68px

  &--vertical &__content
    // https://stackoverflow.com/questions/35111090/text-in-a-flex-container-doesnt-wrap-in-ie11
    align-items: stretch
    flex-direction: column
    height: auto
    padding: 16px 16px 8px

    .v-btn
      &.v-btn // Higher specificity
        align-self: flex-end
        justify-self: flex-end
        margin-left: 0
        margin-top: 18px

      &__content
        flex: 0 0 auto
        margin: 0

@media #{map-get($display-breakpoints, 'sm-and-up')}
  .v-snack
    &__wrapper
      min-width: 344px
      max-width: 672px

      .v-snack--left &
        margin-left: 0

      .v-snack--right &
        margin-right: 0

    &__content .v-btn:first-of-type
      +ltr()
        margin-left: 42px

      +rtl()
        margin-right: 42px

.v-snack-transition
  &-enter
    .v-snack__wrapper
      transform: scale(.8)

  &-enter,
  &-leave-to
    .v-snack__wrapper
      opacity: 0
